titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of lithotripters.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4848.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to exclude extracorporeal shock wave lithotripters with respect to the duty treatment of electro-surgical apparatus. Suspends, through December 31, 1987, the duty on extracorporeal shock wave lithotripters for use by nonprofit hospitals and research or educational institutions.
